channel.title: Few questions
channel.description: well these are my questions: how do i change the location when you die and where do i need to put it? What is the ban and ip ban script and where do i need to put it? How do i change this: i got a area when u go there with the command its in wildy imidiatly. but how do i make a little area of that wild-free

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Where is the spot? if it’s near the edge of the wild back the cord’s up a little outta the wild if not make a safe spot… once you answer this I’ll give ya a safe spot tut if you need it.

Read full topic

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

[quote=“x spike x, post:2, topic:171232”]When a player dies the re-spawn point is the same as the starting point all you need to do is open player.java and search for:

Player start point

Or something to that effect, it varies for different sources, once you have found the procedure change the teleportToX = Xcoord and teleportToY = Ycoord
The “Xcoord” to the X coordinate of the starting position and the “Ycoord” to the Y coordinate of the starting position.

The IP ban bans a users IP address from connection to your server. There are a few TUTS on adding IP ban to your server which will tell you exactly where to put it.[/quote]
kk ty but do you know the answer on the area thing?

Read full topic

item.title: Few questions
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

When a player dies the re-spawn point is the same as the starting point all you need to do is open player.java and search for:

Player start point

Or something to that effect, it varies for different sources, once you have found the procedure change the teleportToX = Xcoord and teleportToY = Ycoord
The “Xcoord” to the X coordinate of the starting position and the “Ycoord” to the Y coordinate of the starting position.

The IP ban bans a users IP address from connection to your server. There are a few TUTS on adding IP ban to your server which will tell you exactly where to put it.

Read full topic
